name: @heartly/root
description: Heartly is tool for providing friendly helpful documentation and config to code repositories

scripts.chore:delete-changelog-branch: if git show-ref --quiet refs/heads/chore-changelog; then git branch -D chore-changelog; fi
scripts.chore:setup-next-work: git checkout master && npm run chore:delete-changelog-branch
scripts.chore:pr: git add . && git commit -m '[chore] updates changelog' --no-verify && git push origin chore-changelog -f
scripts.chore: yarn chore:delete-changelog-branch && yarn chore:branch && yarn chore:changelog && yarn chore:pr && yarn chore:setup-next-work
scripts.postpublish: git tag $npm_package_version && git push origin --tags && yarn chore
scripts.release: yarn lint && yarn build && npm test && yarn report:coverage

hooks.pre-commit: yarn test && yarn format && yarn pre-commit-msg
